recipesJson.name: #DMC Challange Chi Chi's Mexican Fried Ice Cream
recipesJson.author: DaddyKane91
recipesJson.description: A favorite in many Mexican restaurants this delectable dessert offers a very unique and textured appeal when it comes to a dessert... i have had it on many occasions and love it at my local restaurant #Villa fiesta .. and i thought i would give it the ole DMC go .. and try to recreate it in an Ejuice...

pageContext.name: #DMC Challange Chi Chi's Mexican Fried Ice Cream
